content.prompt: The shaded areas on the map of early eighteenth century France shown above represent

choices.label: lands controlled by peasants revolting against feudal obligations
territorial acquisitions during the reign of Louis XIV
land controlled by foreign rulers within the kingdom of France
Huguenot strongholds that still existed after the revocation of the Edict of Nantes
former Spanish territories on the border of France

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
